resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Lucida Grande', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: #fafafa;">The scribe is here trying out an alternative verse, which can be found in a poem copied in another manuscript (Sankt-Gallen, CSG 48, p. 395, cf. next image), thus allowing to confirm the connection between the two.
resource.chars: The scribe is here trying out an alternative verse, which can be found in a poem copied in another manuscript (Sankt-Gallen, CSG 48, p. 395, cf. next image), thus allowing to confirm the connection between the two.
